Chennai City Sightseeing (1 Day Trip) роЪрпЖройрпНройрпИ City Sightseeing (1 Day Trip)

Explore ChennaiтАЩs iconic locations with a flexible plan. Visit ancient temples, colonial monuments, and the vibrant Marina Beach. Explore роЪрпЖройрпНройрпИтАЩs iconic locations with a flexible plan.

Route Plan рокропрогродрпН родро┐роЯрпНроЯроорпН

1

Pickup

Start at 9:00 AM.

2

Kapaleeshwarar

Mylapore temple visit.

3

Santhome Basilica

Historic church built over St. Thomas tomb.

4

Govt Museum

Egmore Museum (closed Fridays).

5

Marina Beach

Sunset at the world's second-longest urban beach.

6

Drop

End of tour.

Service Details & Information роЪрпЗро╡рпИ ро╡ро┐ро╡ро░роЩрпНроХро│рпН

Service Overview роЪрпЗро╡рпИ роХрогрпНрогрпЛроЯрпНроЯроорпН

Chennai (Madras) is the capital of Tamil Nadu. It is known for its rich cultural heritage, British colonial architecture, and the second-longest urban beach in the world. Chennai (Madras) is the capital of Tamil Nadu. It is known for its rich cultural heritage, British colonial architecture, and the second-longest urban beach in the world.

Important Information роорпБроХрпНроХро┐роп родроХро╡ро▓рпНроХро│рпН
